name: @dcs-delta/msdk-declarations
description: Delta type declarations for the DCS Mission Scripting Environment.

scripts.generate-index: find types -type f -name '*.d.ts' -exec echo '/// <reference path="{}" />' \; > index.d.ts
scripts.package: ( test -f index.d.ts || npm run generate-index) && mkdir -vp bin && npm pack --pack-destination bin
